issues.title: Stale Documentation References to PipelineIntegrationService
issues.description: Multiple documentation files still reference PipelineIntegrationService and ValidatedGroup as active components, creating documentation debt
issues.recommendation: Update docs/story-tracking-web-app-architecture.md to remove or mark the Pipeline Integration Service section as deprecated/removed

issues.title: Silent Orphan Integration Fallback Without Error Tracking
issues.description: When OrphanIntegrationService fails, code silently falls back to direct orphan creation without tracking the fallback occurrence
issues.recommendation: Add orphan_integration_fallbacks counter to ProcessingResult or add info-level entry to result.errors

issues.title: Quality Gate Threshold Not Configurable via Environment
issues.description: Quality gate thresholds are hardcoded constants with no environment variable support
issues.recommendation: Add environment variable fallbacks for runtime configuration

issues.title: Test Coverage Gap - No EvidenceValidator Mock Tests
issues.description: Tests rely on EVIDENCE_VALIDATOR_AVAILABLE being False; no mocked tests for validator integration path
issues.recommendation: Add tests with mocked validate_samples to cover is_valid=True, is_valid=False, and exception paths

issues.title: Inconsistent Orphan Count Semantics in OrphanIntegrationService Path
issues.description: OrphanIntegrationService path increments orphans_updated by 1 regardless of conversation count, unlike fallback path
issues.recommendation: Clarify and document counting semantics - per-signature or per-conversation

positive_observations: Comprehensive test coverage with 786 lines of new tests
Conservative error handling - quality gates fail-safe on exceptions
Clean PipelineIntegrationService deletion with no orphaned imports
Good logging at appropriate levels for debugging
Proper test migration from deleted test_pipeline_integration.py
